column6: - Representing the hit Infinite Comic in print for the first time! - Deadpool and his bride-to-be take on the forces of Dracula...for keeps! - Plus: an all-new epilogue story!
column8: | penciller (cover):Reilly Brown | writer:Gerry Duggan | writer:Brian Posehn | artist:Scott Koblish | artist:Khary Randolph
